GSD.description:
ext4: fix warning in ext4_iomap_begin as race between bmap and write

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit e1682c7171a6c0ff576fe8116b8cba5b8f538b94. For more details please see the references link.
